abstract: No relationship, according to an analysis of Gallup poll data from the most recent six presidential administrations.
snippet: No relationship, according to an analysis of Gallup poll data from the most recent six presidential administrations.
lead_paragraph: Gallup has an interesting brief up about the relationship between presidential approval ratings and the stock market. The short version: There isn’t one.

headline.main: Presidential Approval Ratings vs. the Dow
